content: *crochet this zig-zag blanket in the rainbow colors of bernat giggles bernat com * **skill level ** easy **gauge ** one pattern repeat 23 sts = 6¾ 17 cm **yarn requirements ** bernat® giggles 3 5 oz/100 g * contrast a #56630 oh sunny day **1 ball** * contrast b #56230 giggling green **1 ball** * contrast c #56320 laughing lavender **1 ball** * contrast d #56128 cheerful blue **1 ball** * contrast e #56420 tickled pink **1 ball** * contrast f #56005 white **2 balls** worked in 2-row ripple pattern in alternating colors also in french 1 1 http //com yarnspirations pattern-pdfs s3 amazonaws com/bernat_giggles002_babyblanket fr_ca pdf
